ccm:application.name: ccm-atoz
ccm:application.ccm:description:
The ccm-atoz package enables a site to present all it's content in alphabetical order as an additional service to it's users. Usually the theme provides a link to the page as part of its static elements.
By default the application presents the A-Z list at ~/ccm/atoz/.
An administration interface is provided at ~/ccm/atoz/admin/. Here you can configure the content to be listed by selecting an appropriate content provider.
